title: How to Change Your Bitmoji's Gender

steps.title: Open the Bitmoji app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the Bitmoji app on your phone or tablet. It’s the green icon with a white winking chat bubble. You'll find it on your home screen or in your app list. The only way to change your Bitmoji’s gender is to reset your avatar. You’ll lose all of your custom details (facial features, hair, outfit, etc), but you’ll be able to select a new gender when creating your new avatar. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the gear icon.
steps.content: Tap the gear icon. It's at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap My Data.
steps.content: Tap My Data . It's near the bottom of the menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Reset Avatar.
steps.content: Tap Reset Avatar . A pop-up will appear, asking you to confirm. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . This resets your Bitmoji avatar and opens the gender selection screen.

steps.title: Select a gender.
steps.content: Select a gender. Now you'll be able to customize your new avatar's face, hair, and outfit with the gender expression of your choice.
